Articles.Content:
Just here to share an idea and see how the community reacts to it and maybe someone would be interested in actually putting it to work.

So my idea is, the robotic arm from the breaking ground expansion is limited to the new "formations" on the planet surface, but in reality we could use it to take an surface sample for instance, that would make even more sense to put one in a rover, or maybe even on a craft exploring the bottom of the ocean, what do you guys think
It would be neat if they could be used in the next update to weld parts as long as you have an engineer onboard.
A cutter hand. To cut off solar panels and antennas to grab the hull for recycling.
